Name: Streamer's Life
About the game: RPG-Simulation game where you can create your own streamer and see whether you can overcome difficulties of being streamer or not. How parents can affect your life as a streamer? What events streamers stumble upon? How often you'll rage on troll type of viewers? Your choices can lead to interesting consequences. All these questions and many more are answered in the game.
